00023 {

00036         lodSlider->setRange(0, 5);
00037

00039         boundBoxCheckBox = new QCheckBox;
00040 
00041         dispSkeleton = new QLabel(tr("Skeleton : "));
00042         dispSkeletonCheckBox = new QCheckBox;
00043

00045         gridDispLayout->addWidget(renderDetail, 0, 0);
00046         gridDispLayout->addWidget(renderDetailCombo, 0, 1);
00047 
00048         gridDispLayout->addWidget(boundingBox, 1, 0);

00050

00056         groupDisp->setLayout(gridDispLayout);
00058

00060         groupMat = new QGroupBox("Materials Options");
00061         groupMat->setMaximumHeight(100);
00062

00064         viewMatBtn = new QPushButton(tr("Modify"));

00110 void ObjProperties::updateListAnim(Ogre::AnimationStateSet* anims)
00111 {
00112         if(anims != 0){
00113         Ogre::AnimationStateIterator animNames = anims->getAnimationStateIterator();
00114         while(animNames.hasMoreElements()){
00115             listAnimCombo->addItem(animNames.getNext()->getAnimationName().c_str());
00116         }
00117                 loopCheckBox->setEnabled(true);
00118                 playCheckBox->setEnabled(true);
00119         }
00120         else{
00121                 loopCheckBox->setEnabled(false);
00122                 playCheckBox->setEnabled(false);
00123 
00124         }
00125 }
